version_description:
1. Compatible with iOS13.
2. Fixed some bugs.

1. The homepage is redesigned, and scenes can be executed directly!
2. The home page has added a shortcut control function. You can contorl your air conditioning mode, wind speed, temperature directly on the homepage, and also support TV, set-top boxes and so on!
3. Added the intelligent grouping "Me"--"Settings"--"Smart Group". Sockets, bulbs, TVs, can be put together!
4. When editing the scene, you can set the delay of the action.
5. Other details optimization and bug fixes.

1. The scenes can be executed directly!
2. Shortcut control function has been added. You can contorl your air conditioner mode, wind speed, temperature directly, and also support TV, set-top box!
3. Smart group has been added. You can go to "Me"--"Settings"--"Smart Group" to turn it on. Sockets, bulbs, TVs, can be put together!
4. When editing the scene, you can set the delay of the action.
5. Other details optimization and bug fixes.

1. Fixed the bug of RM4C mini setup failure (only occurrd for users using European server).
2. Added "All on" and "All off" templates for scenes. Now you don't need to specify the action of each device but just group devices in these templates.
3. You can add any function from remote panel to scenes (previously only ON/OFF is supported).
4. SmartConfig supports batch configuration (adding multiple devices at same time).
5. Other bug fixes.

1. Added local weather information on the app homepage.
2. Night mode has been supported! ("Me"-"Night Mode")
3. Fix known bugs.

1. Added local weather information on the app homepage.
2. Night mode has been supported! ("Me"-"Night Mode")

1. Added quick sign-in with Google account and Apple ID (requires association with BroadLink account in app before next sign-in).
2. Supported customized scene icon by taking picture or uploading from photo album.
3. Other UI improvements and bug fixes.
